steps.conclusion:
1. The title “Growth Hacking” is in English, while all other titles are in Spanish—this mixes languages against the instruction to write titles in the target language (es).
2. The title “Analítica en Redes Sociales” uses “en” instead of the more canonical “de” (i.e., “Analítica de Redes Sociales”).

1. Translate or adapt “Growth Hacking” into Spanish for consistency (e.g., “Técnicas de Growth Hacking” or “Crecimiento Hacker”).
2. Rename “Analítica en Redes Sociales” to “Analítica de Redes Sociales” for clearer, more canonical phrasing.
3. Optionally add another field like “Marketing de Influencers” to broaden the set of course suggestions.
